website_summaries.verdict: Samsung needs to improve its app interface and introduce at least one smart-home partner to broaden the overpriced SmartCam PT's appeal.
pros: Samsung's $229 SmartCam PT does a pretty good job tracking motion activity around a room
It offers local and cloud storage, motion detection zones and a privacy mode
cons: You'll be using the same clunky old SmartCam Android or iPhone app as before
The SmartCam PT doesn't work with any smart home platforms, even Samsung's SmartThings
Trigger-happy motion and audio sensors set off tons of unneeded alerts, but adjusting their sensitivity helped some

customer_reviews.title: I contacted Samsung and am disappointed these are not "officially" Samsung
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cameras as I searched on Amazon for cameras compatible with Samsung Smartthing. These came up in the search. I purchase 2 of them and set them up (which is quite easy) but couldn't get them to appear in my Smartthing app. I couldn't find it anywhere. I contacted Samsung and am disappointed these are not "officially" Samsung. It's a different division and they are not supported by Samsung. I find this VERY deceptive by both Samsung and Amazon. The cameras work and have a good picture.. but will not ever be compatible with Smartthing as it's not made nor supported by Samsung. Not sure if I will be keeping these. BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hanold

customer_reviews.title: Camera was great at first
customer_reviews.text: Camera was great at first, however, on the 11 month before the warranty would end the Samsung camera started to act up. The camera was acting like it was possessed. It was moving on it's own. I sent it over to Samsung to get it fix and supposedly the camera was fix. However, a month later the camera started to have connection issues to my router. Works about a few days until I have to reset it again. My camera is out of warranty and it will cost to much to get it fix. It's best for me to just buy a different brand of camera.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie V.

customer_reviews.title: so I wasted 300 bucks on cameras that only served their intended ...
customer_reviews.text: Three days after the return window closed, Samsung "updated" the android app such that it no longer works with these cameras... so I wasted 300 bucks on cameras that only served their intended purpose for 30 days. These cameras do not work with the current version of the android app, they do not work with the samsung smart cloud, and they do not work with the samsung smart things stuff... in short, they aren't very smart, and neither was I.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Lord

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. Great Audio. I'm a tech type person and it is clumsy linking it to the wifi....takes several tries and it doesn't go as the manual planned it to. That said, with some patience it's a very nice camera. Tilts and pans with no isssues. This is my second one. Very pleased after owning the first one for several months and felt comfortable getting another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera from a different vendor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second camera to complement an identical one that I had purchased from a different vendor. This one arrived unsecured in the packing. The fastener that was supposed to hold the camera solid and protected was in the bottom of the box. This leads me to believe that it had been repackaged even though I bought it as a new product. The gears grind and there is loud clicking noises coming from within during setup. Totally opposite of my previous camera. The setup could not be completed thru the smartcam app because some fault in the camera would allow discovery of the camera but not connect or function. I am returning this product/
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Difficult to Setup with very poor Support
customer_reviews.text: Programming and documentation for this camera are not up to current standards. I tried to get it to connect to my wifi for one week with no luck. Construction is quite flimsy compared to cameras now. I have a different Samsung camera that is also very fussy. I believe this is a rebranded Wisenet camera made in China. I had hoped that Samsung had improved their cameras but they haven't. I am returning the camera. It will be my first Amazon return after several years of membership.
customer_reviews.author: frederick r welsh

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a "Samsung" Smartcam because I assumed it would be well integrated with SmartThings and other smarthome products. Apparently Samsung sold the business, but let's the new owner use the branding. The features are not being updated. It's now missing a lot of features you can now get from other competitive products. I ended up replacing all of mine with Nest. Arlo seems better too.
customer_reviews.author: GWSTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera because I thought I was hearing noises outside my house at night. This camera supports night vision, and it is easy to see the outside of my house when it is sitting beside my sliding glass door. The camera is also great for viewing my dog when she is home alone. I love it because I can record my voice, and my dog can hear it. You can also record the sound to SD cord or your phone. You can also pan and tilt the camera so that it will go around the room. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Paputsakis

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera with important remote functions
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite monitored home security camera. Picture quality is excellent. Has many helpful features including 3 settings that allows the camera to surveil 3 different, reproducible areas. Also has a novelty barking dog, alarm, and police siren that are convincing and controlled remotely. This appears to be discontinued. So Sad!
customer_reviews.author: DBrown

customer_reviews.title: Great little Camera!
customer_reviews.text: you can adjust the video quality so that you can store more in the SD card, you can record continuesly or just when there is motion. You can also put it on privacy mode. I get the motion detection alerts on my phone which is great. I have been using it for over a month and very happy so far. Great camera for the price !
customer_reviews.author: T. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Second camera I have purchased - very easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I have one that I have used for just over one year. I bought this second one in addition to the first one. Both cameras show up on the same app and it is very easy to use. I watch ducks at our lake house out the back and check on unexpected package delivery/guests with the one in the front. Both cameras are sitting on a windowsill inside our 2nd house but can be spun around to look inside or out of the window. Had just one incident with the first camera, where tech support had to send me a new camera but they were very helpful and responsive. Has worked very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kay E Koitzsch

customer_reviews.title: good for watching yur house
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my home while on vacation and could look into my home from 3 states away, it would disconnect and I would have to reconnect it, but it served the purpose...I would recommend it....
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: The gimble to the camera sucks and turns on, on its own.
customer_reviews.text: The camera will turn on without me pressing it. It will turn on its own and when it reaches its limit it will keep clicking trying to do a full 360. The camera itself is great but the gimble does not work properly. Also theres a lag between the camera and what you see on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Agudo

customer_reviews.title: Camera works good. It will not stream 1080P on my DSL ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera works good. It will not stream 1080P on my DSL 20mbps download, 1mbps upload. That might be my connection speed, so I wont straight out blame the camera. I CAN stream Med quality "most" of the time with those speeds, for anyone else wondering. The sounds are ok. They are not going to fake or scare anyone if that was their point. App works most the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Elliott

customer_reviews.title: 1080p looks great
customer_reviews.text: It is very well made. I like the sleek design. Connects flawlessly and streams a very good image. I really like that it is powered by a micro USB cable. Its one of the first cameras Ive seen powered by USB and makes for a super-easy setup. I only wish it had a battery like the Logitech Circle does.
customer_reviews.author: goconfigure

customer_reviews.title: Good product just a bad setup system and software
customer_reviews.text: Not very good by bought this cam and found out every one is having trouble getting it up and running can't get samsung to help in setup or refund the money I spent and now can't use would not buy another there are other cam out there that will set up without all the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When they work, they are great. Just buy a warrantly with it
customer_reviews.text: Once you finish the setup up process which doesn't always work. These work amazing. The power goes out and they automatically reconnect. The issue is with the setup. Two of these I had would not complete the setup. Another one lost connection when the power went out and would never re attach itself. They automatically reconnect but if you have issues with them not doing that, sometimes you can't reset and start over like they tell you to. Already having multiple units, it's too much of a hassle to have to change the whole platform.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: was a great camera
customer_reviews.text: 6 months ago purchased worked fine until recently no its acting up just spins, moves up and down all day can't see because of constant moving im sure its under warranty but im not getting a response from the seller
customer_reviews.author: robert pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy instal, with great picture resolution
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Very easy and fast wifi setup. Does not require direct router connection for set up. In addition, when the power goes out it will come back up without having to reset or reconfigure. Don't bother with the other off brand cameras. This is the best one out of 3 others I tried. I'm going to buy additional camera. I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ice

customer_reviews.title: What is wrong with sd card
customer_reviews.text: Picture. Two way audio. Motion detective. Everything was perfect. Only one thing. App always shows “ please properly install SD card “ what a noring
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful to have.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tool to have when monitoring a site, a patient or a residence from a distant location. It is easy to install and easy to program. One can share the monitoring with friends as well. As an example, I can share the monitoring activities at a home in Jamaica with another family member living in England. All in all, this camera is what you need to protect your values and your investments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: if I go away I can check on my cats in the house and make sure the pet sitter is doing her job, so I like this camera, I have 3 of them one in the basement and one in the kitchen and one in the front bedroom watching the front of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda S Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing security camera!
customer_reviews.text: Just the camera i've been waiting for!! Having owned 3 nest cam and arlo cameras, I was never satisfied with their functionalities and despised paying a fee for continuous recording. That's why I was so excited to hear that samsung released this pan tilt camera with an external sd drive. The Pan tilt function covers 180 and 360 degrees, so that i don't need to buy 2-3 cameras to cover all angles. Motion and auto tracking works just as expected. This is such an affordable camera for home, office or baby monitoring. Really hope in the future they can make one for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: It's a sentinel for my house.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it can cover an entire bottom floor of my home and also keep an eye on my dog. It's pretty cool to use. My home wifi sucks so sometimes it'll lose connection to my iPhone. The resolution is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: No reply to service issue
customer_reviews.text: When the camera works its relatively decent. Either the camera or the app is very finicky. I have 2 cameras and I can view both of them about 50% of the time. Usually one of the cameras is not viewable for whatever reason, and more than I would like either of them work. The usb cord broke after a few months. I emailed about the issue and got no response.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy

customer_reviews.title: I love them. I have three and they are the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I have three and they are the best. Great pictures and sound. I can now clean while my daughter works out in the gym and observe her without being in the same room. I can also speak with her from work. The best thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor on the market
customer_reviews.text: Great baby monitor. We love this. No subscription, great streaming with android and iproducts. Streaming app is bug-free and free. I highly recommend this camera, especially as a baby monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytee

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with camera.
customer_reviews.text: Second one. Happy with camera and notification. Would buy again if more needed.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. No issues so far with performance. Comes up every time on my phone and performs all functions well
customer_reviews.author: Stephen McCullen

customer_reviews.title: This one is pretty easy to get going
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of different IP cameras. This one is pretty easy to get going. Though it will be tough if not impossible to integrate into a DIY home security system and the live feed is not easily shareable with others.
customer_reviews.author: rjzinger

customer_reviews.title: Bought total 10 New SmartCam
customer_reviews.text: Bought Ten New SmartCam, One when it turn, making noise, return and get money back
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great cameras. Easy set up. Love the quality of sound and video. We installed Memory cards and set it up So it records only when motion is detected. App is simple to use, I like the police siren I can use in case I catch someone breaking in. We will be buying more. I have recommended these to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The camera works on low and high def to allow best view, works great, would recommend to anyone with the need for monitoring anyone at any age, will probably get a second one for the playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This camera keeps losing internet connection. I have two other Samsung cameras, different models, that don't have disconnection problem.
customer_reviews.author: msmnro

customer_reviews.title: On a slow 4G connection medium resolution worked fine but high resolution was extremely slow
customer_reviews.text: Works as I wanted. On a slow 3G connection only low resolution worked properly. On a slow 4G connection medium resolution worked fine but high resolution was extremely slow. On straight WIFI everything worked fine. The above results were a result of my poor cell service and not the camera. Even on medium resolution the video was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The SAMSUNG SMARTcam is spoiled and no coverage SAMSUNG Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me on 25 October 2018 but now it can’t connect to wifi and Showing red lighting. I contacted to SAMSUNG service but they rejected as I bought it from Amazon. I think this is really bad because I bought it with expensive pay. But cover under warranty! Anyone can help me???

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. No Samsong serviceEven though it appears that Samsung is selling it
customer_reviews.author: Top buyer

customer_reviews.title: View
customer_reviews.text: It’s seems a bit blurry. My old camera was much clearer.
customer_reviews.author: James shields

customer_reviews.title: Keeps powering off and on & Connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: Im glad i only brought one camera. When it works its fine when it doesn't its very annoying. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera so far! Good picture, easy set up
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... far this camera works very well and was very easy top set up
customer_reviews.text: So far this camera works very well and was very easy top set up. The picture is clear and the night vision is very good. Motion detection and alerting works well. Thinking of getting some outside cameras to add on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Remote Camera
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this camera. Couldn’t ask for more, especially at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: chipt911

customer_reviews.title: Still Trust on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This product I bought as open box but I received used and many assoceries missing , no instruction book , no warranty paper , no bracket to install on wall and few other small items. Looks very used dont know it is working properly or not. I am very upset so want return but dont want to pay postage.
customer_reviews.author: ANJU BEAUTY

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Now I can watch my dogs at any moment of the day
customer_reviews.author: david torosian

customer_reviews.title: Business recomended
customer_reviews.text: Received this camera and put it to use right a way, I have a retail store in the mall and it helps me a lot with keeping an eye on the business from anywhere, great in: Easy to setup great resolution speaker Mic Tilt and pan best thing brightness control just incase if a light it hitting I can still see defiantly recommend this for business or home.
customer_reviews.author: Wail Shawky

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. It's the instruction manual that stinks!

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with the product

customer_reviews.title: Good quality camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera since Oct. of 2016 and never had any issues with it. I never had to reboot it to fix any problem. The picture quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: NeoVision

customer_reviews.title: Nice cameras
customer_reviews.text: This is s pretty nice little camera. I actually bought two of them for the house and they work well through the app on my iPhone. Sometimes it takes several attempts to replay an event, but other than that I've had no problems with these cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: It makes alot of noise as it moves to follow the moving object

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this camera
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this product, it has no benefit, difficulties in communication operation , DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT !!!

customer_reviews.title: Good, price easy to set up, and use.
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to set up and use I am so far very happy with this web cam. And the price wasn't to bad either. Delivery was also fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry K.

customer_reviews.title: Pan and tilt
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son after using mine for several years. He loves them. For the price I couldn't find anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Great camera horrible app.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great, image and functionality, features and design...when it works! The app is horrible always disconnecting. There are 2 apps available and both have the same issues a real shame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I can pan the room (I use it to check on my dog while I'm out). Clarity is better than my other security camera models.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Boutross

customer_reviews.title: Not the one in Picture or Discription
customer_reviews.text: They send you Wisenet Cameras not Sansung and if you have Cameras already the Wisenet run a different APP so you cant have all cameras together. Same Camera different App
customer_reviews.author: STEVE WORD

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: The Camera arrived on time. But the Camera was not well tied to its original cover, Which causing some minor scratches..
customer_reviews.author: Hasan

customer_reviews.title: Easy operation
customer_reviews.text: As long as you have internet it runs perfect and will send notifications to your cellphone when you're not at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. Very easy to set up requiring no technical experience, just plug it in and set up the app. Use it to monitor a vacation home including looking at the wall thermostat both night and day. Additionally using a SNH-V6414BMR SmartCam to monitor the basement for water and grinder pump light alarm. Saving money by no longer paying someone to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: Motion motor is a bit noisy...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Works pretty well. The motion camera is a bit quirky but it works. The motor that moves the camera is pretty loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally love it!!!!...
customer_reviews.text: Camera is completely amazing! Has a quick and easy setup. The audio feedback is wonderful. Great video quality even on medium resolution. And to top it all off it continues to work even when the power goes out. Will do an updated review after I test it out a little more. Will totally refer to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Tootieb90

customer_reviews.title: easy to use right out of the
customer_reviews.text: works well, easy to use right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: I'm Hooked!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cameras. I have 12 of them, placed in my Residential Facilities. They are excellent for remote monitoring.
customer_reviews.author: Stevi Louise

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: IOS app is a bit challenging to use, but camera works very well.
customer_reviews.author: WhyZee

customer_reviews.title: Love the high defintion camera features.
customer_reviews.text: I use the Samsung camera indoors for security purposes. They need to upgrade the software though.
customer_reviews.author: Lee D. Gates SR.

customer_reviews.title: love the features
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of this camera , love the features, resolution, phenomenal camera. one camera serves the purpose of multiple cameras, with the tilt and pan feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jed Martin

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and easy setup instructions
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and easy setup instructions. Love being able to pan and the night vision. My only issue is the video not being smooth and the camera continuously disconnecting. I'm not sure yet if that issue is with my Wi-Fi or the app. Nice wall mount included as well
customer_reviews.author: Ronica Case

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smartcam
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, always been a fan of Samsung electronics .
customer_reviews.author: miguel rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Wifi Camera I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: One of the Best Wifi Camera I ever bought... Great image quality and simple setup (keep in mind, need to make sure your Access Point is strong enough to reach the camera. well worthed for the money you spend for this hardware...
customer_reviews.author: D. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love the product easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product support.
customer_reviews.text: Could not get camera set up. Tryed everything before calling support. Product support was the worse I have ever dealt with. They knew less then I did. I was told I must be putting in my password wrong. Nope was definitely not doing that wrong. In the end I was told to try to use another phone. No thank you would like to use my stuff thank you. The camera looks nice just useless along with the support.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Blinn

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: First day with the camera, was very easy to setup and get working. Going to test some more, but the audio and tracking features seem to lag a bit. Almost seems like you could walk fast or run past it and it won't keep tracking. Package came a day early, which was a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the product it self works fine i can see my home while im at work
customer_reviews.text: Over all it was okay, but the price it's a little high maybe the brand name ,the product it self works fine i can see my home while im at work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Setup was easy. Image better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. Setup was easy. Image better than expected. Moving around a little stilted but has four presets. May buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: P&T Smartcam
customer_reviews.text: This is my sixth smartcam and thnk the Pan & Tilt is great! When I fist started out with a camera in mind, Pan & tilt was the man option needed and now it is here ! Looks and work great and will buy another on soon.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera...I am watching you kids!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. I wish it was slightly wider angle, that is why 4 stars. I wish the little function pictures would show what they are if you touch instead of looking at the tutorial each time it starts, but other then that its great. We used it just today to check on the teenagers who were staying home instead of shopping. Love triggering the "dog" sound to let the kids know I am watching. My tablet has much loader sound when I am talking through the camera speaker than does my phone. Not sure why. Would recommend. It beets the heck out of the yearly fee some cloud cameras charge.
customer_reviews.author: BWW

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Super fast shipping from vendor
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Super fast shipping from vendor. Huge bonus it works with the same app as my 3 year old cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Ramy

customer_reviews.title: High Resolutions not working,
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not like Samsung this is wise net ,
customer_reviews.author: Yogi patel

customer_reviews.title: This one seems to work great, has many features
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, first one had issues. This one seems to work great, has many features, like motion tracking. It can cover 3 three door ways. It does what it says it does, also has a privacy mode while we are at the house.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Licht

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Camera to help you feel safe when you're away.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome! I mounted the camera inside to view into different rooms and also to view outside. I have smart lights that can be turned on and off to help aid the night vision. The tracking feature works well also. This works very well with other Samsung cameras and has a strong connection unlike some of the cheap cameras out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars all the way! This camera is just what I've been looking for. I've purchased cameras of less value in the past and none of them come close to this Samsung camera. The viewing quality and the 1080p video and audio playback is outstanding. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This camera arrived today. VERY easy setup, you will be up and running in minutes. Lots and lots of features (black out times for privacy; motion detection <-- love that feature, the camera will pan and keep track of a person entering a room!, sound detection as an alert...many more). Because of my ISP's upload rate, I had to switch the camera to its lowest resolution and I did not notice a difference on my phone. I'm very satisfied with this purchase and will be buying a couple more for the sake of keeping tabs on my home while I travel. Solid unit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This was everything I was looking for in a remote camera for my home. I could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Admiral

customer_reviews.title: SmartCam SNH-V6410PN
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Camera. I have 4 other smart cams , easy setup. Excellent image quality, They just work. App for IOS works perfectly. Recording video is easy. Highly recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This camera works very well I feel confident my house is secure when I'm not home
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Knott

customer_reviews.title: The camera works great. The way it can turn all around works ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera works great. The way it can turn all around works well. My only complaint which is not limited to Samsung cameras like this is that you have to load everything to the "cloud" to see the video. So it is a little weird that Samsung is "watching" my baby too. If you're ok with that it's a good camera.
customer_reviews.author: marabon

customer_reviews.title: I like this camera for it's many features
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera for it's many features. I have two other brands that produce pretty good video , however I have to pay for cloud storage to get the most use out of them,though Samsung does have cloud storage now it's an option and not mandatory. I like the SD capability, the revolving 360 capabilities, and the private mode . The only thing that is a downer is the app for android, that they need to work on. So far I am happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: FB

customer_reviews.title: Pan and Tilt with Samsung SNH-V6410
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with our purchase of the Samsung SNH-V6410. Installation was easy. Picture quality is fair; however, our Samsung SmartCam HD Pro 1080p Full-HD Wi-Fi Camera is far more clear than the SNH-V6410. For the price, I would have expected the better quality. The pan and tilt feature is great, and makes up for the fair picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Civea I. Waleski

customer_reviews.title: Momma likes the camera :-)
customer_reviews.text: The camera has a lot of cool features and it was very easy to setup! Being able to pan and zoom is very useful and it allows to setup custom views for each camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Its a great product! So easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product! So easy to use and set up! my husband and I both have the app on our phone. We bought the SD card so its easy to store and save activity. You can set it up where ever you want! So great that you dont have to pay a monthly fee and it can hook up to additional cameras. You can set it up for movement or sound. We can keep track of our dog and use the speaker as needed,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Cam! easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Simple setup and does exactly what I need it to do. The recording is clear and the ability to record to an external memory card is awesome. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice  - Samsung SNH-V6410PN SmartCam Pan/Tilt Full HD...
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, added all functions without problems. Works great and is pretty hands off once setup. No dropped signals yet
customer_reviews.author: justlikesang

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Smaller then i thought it would be which is good. Love that you can pic someone and have it follow them.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Delaney

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: This item works most of the time. I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Michael Murray

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to Samsung's security camera lineup
customer_reviews.text: I have several other fixed-view Samsung cameras, this Pan/Tilt model provides an enhanced feature set. The auto tracking is a nice additional feature, which initiates a record event and supports message notifications. After 30 seconds of non-movement, the camera position is restored to "Home" position. The Pan movements, when auto-tracking, needs improvement (manual Pan is smooth, but auto-tracking is choppy). My video playback stutters on high-res mode, so resolution adjustment was required for smooth local playback.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K.

customer_reviews.title: Auto tracking on samsung snh-v6410pn
customer_reviews.text: This product has a great picture but what I like most is the auto tracking feature
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Hartlage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy setup. Only takes about 10 or so minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Joram Jawort

customer_reviews.title: Quick set-up, great resolution
customer_reviews.text: I have some web based security cameras at home, but they have very poor resolution. This camera has great resolution in both bright and dark conditions. The set-up was pretty easy, and access from my cell phone and tablet is fine. I plan to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan dahm

customer_reviews.title: An easy to set up security camera that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different home security cameras. The SmartCam was by far the easiest to set up. The resolution is superior to other cameras and it works from outside your home wireless network, which unfortunately was not true with other cameras I tried. The SmartCam also avoids monthly subscription costs by storing images on memory cards, and it provides pan, tilt, and zoom. All in all it is a very reasonably priced camera with a host of options.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Robert Wm Shomer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent option for Pan/Tilt IP cam.
customer_reviews.text: Used this and other Samsung SmartCams for home surveillance while I was away on vacation. Set up one for all the major areas of the home. Even set one up for the pet rabbit. They all worked flawlessly. I like this one the best since it allows my to pan and tilt right on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: jlwardn

product_meta.title: Samsung SNH-V6410PN Pan/Tilt 1080P Wi-Fi Camera, Black
product_meta.description: Size:1-pack| Color:BlackThe Samsung SmartCam PT is designed to help you stay connected to your home wherever you are. It gives you the ability to watch your pets and children or check to see if everything is safe and sound through your smartphone and tablet. The Pan and Tilt feature gives you full visibility of your home with a 350 pan and 155 tilt, along with a 96 field of view. It also offers 16 ft. of night vision, providing you with an exceptional view of your home, day and night. Motion Zone Select ensures you are receiving real-time alerts of activities in selected areas, making it easier for you to stay connected to your home. And when you're away, you can interact with your family and pets over 2-Way Talk.
feature_bullets: Quick set-up; 1080{ Full HD Streaming Camera
